places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Orion

reviews.text: Good food , good service . Price a bit high compared to Other road side AC restaurant but was compensated by the cordial staff and great service .... food was freshly prepared and very tasty. We stopped only for lunch . Didn't stay here. Bar is alongside the restaurant

My experience was a little bad because the tv and the land line was not working there. And the room was ok but I saw a bad Habit of staffs that after knocking door they enter the room like a bullish condition I mean very hurried up they are at that time. Not even ask for permission to enter the room no matter they are for food service or something else, they should ask for permission before entering room. And afterall at the time of checkout, after making the bill and after my payment to them the receptionist said a staff to check the room . That was very bad experience, I'm 23 so I think I was not hesitate on this but I'm sure if a aged person was there he must showed the anger to the staff/receptionist. Thank you and I'll go again to see whether my experience can be changed or not..

Phone lines are dead and customers have to save the mobile numbers of restaurant and reception, ring them up to contact. The waiters have no courtesy of waiting for an answer after knocking and immediately break into rooms like untrained thugs. Food is fine.

Review of a place decide it's worthiness( customer - employee relations)

Booking price : price can vary according to situation.

Place:  It's  around 5 km from bhadrak railway station and connected via National Highway.

Parking: parking is free for registered guest and ample space for parking.

Food : complementary breakfast for registered guest free of cost.

Room : room are nice and clean ,for any other services the attendent come .

Bar : Bar available.

The phone lines don't work. We have to save the mobile numbers of the restaurateur and the receptionist separately. The waiters and staff are so untrained that they immediately break into a room without seeking permission from the guests. Food is fine.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Kalyani, Bhadrak, Odisha
address: NH 16, Dahanigadia, Chhak, Charampa, Odisha 756101, India

reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at and I must say that my experience was exceptional.  From the warm welcome at check-in to the impeccable service throughout my stay, every aspect exceeded my expectations.

The comfortable and well-appointed room, along with the attention to cleanliness and hygiene, made my stay truly enjoyable. The hotel's staff members were courteous, accommodating, and went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met.

The dining experience was delightful with a diverse and delicious selection of meals and the complementary breakfast was truly satisfying. I particularly appreciated it.

Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed by the level of professionalism and hospitality exhibited by everyone at all. My stay was nothing short of memorable, and I look forward to returning in the future.

Thank you for providing such a wonderful experience.

Warm regards,
CA Sarbeswar Subudhi

Location is good. Rooms are ok. We have just checked in and waiting for dinner so shall share views on food later on. Apparently the staff behaviour felt good but sooner a incident made us feel how bad is the customer service. We had taken three rooms 203, 204 and 205. Accidentally tea got spilled and there was a spot on bedsheet. I informed immediately to hotel staff who came and said that we need to pay Rs 4000 for it. How pathetic. We need number of the owner to discuss.
The hotel is a small but beautiful property. Parking is there . Food is great . Service is very good . The staff's behaviour was polite . Exactly on the highway..

It was an office trip, I stayed in hotel for 3 nights, the rooms were comfortable and clean. The experience was very good. The hotel stay is economic. Only I found mosquitos in my room which was disturbing

We have just checked into the hotel & ordered for tea. The tea accidentally spilled on the bedsheet causing strain, the hotel is demanding INR 4000/-, when we wanted to negotiate, we were told we could be exempted but in that event the poor housekeeping guy will have to compensate. The overall behaviour was found weird. We expected better treatment & more accommodotating attitude. Would be helpful if someone can share the phone number of the owner/MD.

reviews.text: This one a good place to spend some time with your love ones.... pretty place...and good foods 💕😇

One of the worst hotel experience ever. Checked in late night and found 4-5 guys smoking and drinking at the reception. The whole night they were creating ruckus. The room was also very dirty with cigarette butts and alcohol boxes below the bed and washroom.

Worst experience. It's so good from outside but management of this hotel sucks. They initially denied check in because i paid almost 90% amount to oyo online and as per them OYO don't release fund to them hence they will not allow guest. For exams I next morning I had a late check in around 8pm and after too many calls to OYO which was getting unanswered,they did me a favour to get me worst room possible with uncleaned linen, unfreshed room for staying. Dirty floors, I mean infact they closed main electricity supply as well from early morning. I mean there was nothing good.
Very nice parking

Very very bad hotel. Bathroom light not working, bedsheet is dirty and torn, AC not working but charge AC room price, bathroom flush not work, cupboard area is very much dirty, they dont provide any item like towel, blanket, soap etc. After demand only they provide.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Hello

reviews.text: One of the worst hotels I have seen/stayed, I travel a lot and have to stay in remote places and I know what I am talking about. No electricity, no water, unhygienic bathroom, rooms with mould growing on walls, dirty bedsheets, cockroachs in the room, fruit fly all over inside the room... Overall a complete disaster. BTW I forgot to mention I took their best room "Presidential suite". Road noise is so much you rather sleep in your car it will be more clean, comfortable, quite.

One of the worst hotels I had seen and stayed at. The commodes of the bathroom are in bad condition. We had taken two rooms. In both rooms the outlet pipes basins are leaking and have spots. In one room there was no mirror. In one room there was no phone or calling bell to call the attendant. Though we had stayed for two days the room was not cleaned or made on the second day though asked for several times. The room rate is too high as per room condition and in the town like Bhadrak

Worst ever experience, stinky rooms with fungus all around, highly overpriced, Hospitality totally ZERO, If you will look into their kitchen you will not even drink a glass of water, They don't give even  a half litre water bottle complementary.
In a nutshell, One should spend night on roadside but never stay in this Hotel Hello
Good infrastructure but required to develop in hospitality and food services areas.

Stayed here for 3 days for business purpose. The hotel is located on a highway and doesn't have any nearby activities. Its quite far from city. So not suitable for family stays. But quite comfortable for business travelers. I was initially sceptical to stay in this hotel after reading lot of bad reviews. But the experience was completely different. Rooms are good and comfortable. But can improve on the maintenance especially the walls and bathroom. Since the room given to me was not occupied for quite few days, could feel the damp smell initially. But not to complain. Few amenities in the room like TV, few lights were not functioning. The USP of this hotel is their food and the service. Lip smacking food served hot either at your room or at the restaurant. They do have a wide spread menu (I preferred to choose local food to be on a safer side). Lift is available. But wasn't working. Parking is limited to 6 cars and is a open parking. As the hotel is located in the vicinity of highway, the rooms can become sometimes noisy.

Would I prefer to stay here again? Yes if I travel for business purpose.

places_with_reviews.name: Panthanivas, Bhadrak
address: Motel Chaka, Mathasahi, Gabasahi, Bhadrak, Odisha 756101, India

reviews.text:
Good place rooms ok, staffs very cordial, restaurant food very good. Overall good experience.
But outside garden needs maintenance, pond can be decorated.
Requesting authorities to look
into this matter

Location, Area, Rooms are good. Food and Services are not good.
Staff need to be active. Food preparation is not Hygienic. For marriage, Party functions. Facilities are there.
Food Hygienic and Quality issues are there. Recently experienced. Therefore, a  proper follow up and supervision must be there for any event.

The worst management faced ever.. noone is available during late hours.. one room did not open inspite of trying with alternate keys available with security guard..unhygienic room condition.. unhygienic and dirty washroom with no toilet kit available.. manager is unresponsive especially during night.. I would recommend not to visit this if you wish to stay here for more than 2 hours.. this hotel is unbearable..

I personally stayed there for 3 days for a wedding. I was disappointed with the service. Cause they don't have glass , extra mattress or even extra blanket.

The washroom stinks and the doors where broken.

If you are planning to do a wedding then it's a good decision cause it's spacious and good ambience.
Reasonably good, but staying charges are on the higher side.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Dixit Resort

reviews.text: All the details given over google is wrong , they don’t have pool and its not 4 star hotel its a low class hotel. The staff will mislead you over the call. Its a under construction hotel and you will avoid to stay at such place . Please don’t get fooled by the google description .

I visited this hotel during a marriage ceremony. Food was awesome. But the manager was a very irresponsible person 😡. He just given my room key to a stranger. And he was telling me that he was with me.

The bathrooms we clean but after use they become very smelly even after flushing for  3 to 4 times. The windows of bathrooms were very large. There is no privacy. But has a large parking area. The hall was medium sized. And the hall's wash besin were choked.

This deserves ⭐⭐ 2 star rating only.
😡
Better to avoid. Pathetic service. Initially negotiated room charges including breakfast, but was not provided. Later completely denied by manager about same

Except the location and parking available of the Hotel, nothing is in order. Rooms, services, attendant, ambiance etc. are extremely poor. Even no basic amenities are available in the room and very much unhegenic condition. It is just a Roadside Hotel for emergency stay but room tariff is extremely high.

I had to pay 1000 rs for non ac room for a night. I try to convince the Manager to negotiate something as I need to stay for some hours and need to leave in early morning. But he was too firm. It was late night, I had no choice to stay. The room condition was bad. Smell coming from the bedsheet and materess. Light was so dim in the washroom, you can hardly see anything. Hotel was like Haunted Bungalow. Might be because of less guests, condition was like this.

places_with_reviews.name: Yashoda Hotel
address: 101, kacheri road, kacheri, Chandan Bazar Rd, Naripur, Bhadrak, Odisha 756100, India

reviews.text: Try to avoid this hotel at any cost. You can get bunch of options nearby even during holiday rush. But don't make mistake to come here. This hotel is just bad from every aspect.
Basically the hotel was good and the behaviour of all staff is kind.

It is one of the oldest hotels in Bhadrak. Rooms are standard. You can have a budget stay. Don't expect luxury. Service is ok. Location is the main plus point. It's is situated in the main market, so everything is within walkable distance. Since it is in the middle of the vegetable market, it is always over crowded. The vegetable vendors are sitting in the front of the hotel. So there is no parking space. Sometimes not even a single four wheeler can be parked 😉. Coming to the restaurant, the food is also budget oriented. The food tastes good, the rate is good. Ambience is normal. There is no thali. It's ala carta but don't have a fixed menu. Chicken kassa, pohola macha curry, macha besar taste is very good. Good for lunch and dinner. Usually crowded in the lunch time.

Superb hotel. The hotel manager Ranjan babu is a nice, very helpful person. He is a superb human being. There is a restaurant on the ground floor. The food is also very good. All the staff are really good and helpful. Completely safe and secure place to saty. I really enjoyed my stay here. I would strongly recommend this hotel 10 out of 10. Thank you so much Ranjan babu for your help

Nice looking hotel best in bhadrak
Nice service
